synthesis_conditions.stability: Thermally stable up to 300 °C and chemically stable toward air and moisture
synthesis_conditions.description: MAF-2 consists of a flexible NbO-type cuprous triazolate scaffold and a bcu pore system with large cavities (the NbO cages) interconnected by small, dynamic apertures.

synthesis_conditions.pressure: 10−20 atm for saturation adsorption complexes at room temperature; controlled by backfilled pressures for partial or full loading (123 or 195 K)
synthesis_conditions.unit_cell_deformations: Anisotropic unit-cell distortions are evident for MAF-2·C2H2 (Δa/c = −1.5%, ΔV = −1.0%)
synthesis_conditions.binding_interactions: Strongest host−guest interactions are C−H···N contacts between C2H2 and the 1,2-nitrogens of etz
synthesis_conditions.hexameric_arrangement: Outer ends of six C2H2 molecules interact with each other by C−H···C contacts in a T-shaped conformation to form an S6 cyclic hexamer

synthesis_conditions.pressure: 10−20 atm for saturation adsorption complexes at room temperature; controlled by backfilled pressures for partial or full loading (123 or 195 K)
synthesis_conditions.unit_cell_deformations: Anisotropic unit-cell distortions are evident for MAF-2·CO2 (Δa/c = −0.4%, ΔV = −0.6%)
synthesis_conditions.binding_interactions: CO2 is well embedded inside the pocket and forms short contacts with the 1,2-nitrogens of etz by its electropositive carbon
synthesis_conditions.hexameric_arrangement: CO2 molecules are well separated around a void inside the cage, indicating weak guest−guest interaction and loose structure

materials.name: Partial loading structures of MAF-2 with C2H2 or CO2

synthesis_conditions.description: Framework deformations started from very low loadings and almost completed at x ≈ 0.2. Thermal parameters of framework atoms decrease as uptake increase.
